verses.roman:
raṇako bhavitā tasmāt
surathas tanayas tataḥ
sumitro nāma niṣṭhānta
ete bārhadbalānvayāḥ

synonyms: raṇakaḥ—Raṇaka; bhavitā—will take birth; tasmāt—from Kṣudraka; surathaḥ—Suratha; tanayaḥ—the son; tataḥ—thereafter; sumitraḥ—Sumitra, the son of Suratha; nāma—by the name; niṣṭha-antaḥ—the end of the dynasty; ete—all the above-mentioned kings; bārhadbala-anvayāḥ—in the dynasty of King Bṛhadbala.
translation: From Kṣudraka will come Raṇaka, from Raṇaka will come Suratha, and from Suratha will come Sumitra, ending the dynasty. This is a description of the dynasty of Bṛhadbala.
